CustomField.description: Modifies how Rates are calculated. With this setting work types are ignored on project tasks when calculating the rate of a user. Instead the rate is calculated based on whether any rate cards on the project match the capabilities of the user tracking time. If multiple capabilities match a blended rate is created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Work types are ignored on project tasks when calculating the rate of a user. The rate is calculated based on whether any rate cards on the project match the capabilities of the user tracking time. If multiple matches exist a blended rate is created.
CustomField.label: Use Capability Rates
